prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
V.VINOTH KUMAR　
Mobile No: 91-9345921361          　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　
Email: vinothfrom2110@gmail.com
Objective:                                                                                                                                                         
To pursue a career in software technology where my potential as an IT professional with sound analytical skills can be harnessed and to leverage my interpersonal skills to reach to top notch most position in the field of software technology in the global market. To work in your esteemed organization in which I can prove myself along with the company prospects.
Experience and Skills: 
12+ Years of experience as a Software Programmer.
Expertise in Development, Maintenance, Integration and Migration.
Good coding knowledge in C#.NET, ASP.NET, JavaScript, jQuery, Web services, WCF, MVC, TWS Scheduler, Console Applications, SQL Server, Asp.net WebAPI, Asp.net Core, Angular with Typescript and Entity Framework.
Good Knowledge in Database Design and Stored procedures using SQL Server.
Have working experience in windows application, console application, Web applications, scheduling tasks, Upgrading to .NET technologies (C# Language) 
Have working experience in converting FoxPro classic application into .NET applications (C# Language) and interested in converting any classic language application into .NET Technologies (C# Language)
Exceptionally well organized, strong work ethics and willingness to work hard to achieve employer objectives.
Good communication and interpersonal skills.
Very good at analyzing and solving production issues ASAP with minimum access.
Have experience in leading a minimum of three member’s team.
Educational Qualification:
Master of Computer Application [2006-2009], SNS College of Technology. Coimbatore
Under Anna University Chennai. – 70%
Projects
Registration and Appointments:
Worked on requirement and technical document preparation. Interacting with client and gathering requirements. Mentor
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
